project.title: Flicker
description: Full-stack social media app where users can create posts, like, comment, and manage profiles.
Each profile greets the user and includes an optional info form.
Tech Stack: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Express.js, MySQL (Prisma ORM), JWT Auth.
Deployment: Frontend on Vercel, Backend on Render, Database on Railway.

project.title: 3legant
description: Responsive fashion e-commerce site with dynamic product listings, secure Stripe checkout, and a blog section for fashion content.
Tech Stack: React, Tailwind CSS, DummyJSON API, Stripe

project.title: StreamVibe
description: Responsive web app for exploring trending, top-rated, and upcoming movies/TV shows with search and smooth navigation.
Tech Stack: React, TMDB API, Tailwind CSS

project.title: Photography Portfolio
description: Responsive portfolio site with elegant image galleries, fullscreen previews, and a minimal UI to showcase photography work.

project.title: SweetHouse
description: Responsive React site showcasing chocolate products and store info, with dynamic galleries, smooth animations, seamless navigation, and multilingual support.
Tech Stack: React, Tailwind CSS, i18n (for multilingual support)

description.header: I'm a front-end developer based in Prishtina, passionate about building intuitive and accessible web experiences.
description.body: My journey into development began with a focused course, where I quickly gained a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and for a framework I studied ReactJS. Since then, I've deepened my skills through extensive self-study and hands-on coding, culminating in a portfolio that showcases my capabilities. My projects include a news website demonstrating API integration, a dynamic movie blog with search and filtering functionalities, and an e-commerce site powered by Strapi headless CMS and Stripe payment integration. I'm constantly eager to learn more and tackle new challenges in the front-end space.

description.header: I'm proficient in skills below, with a continuous drive to learn. My goal is to consistently grow my skillset, adding new technologies and deeper expertise every month.
